awd_titl_txt: Mathematical Sciences: Representations of Direct Limit      Groups
awd_abstract_narration: This research planning grant supports the work of Dr.                      Natarajan to work in the representation theory of direct limits of              the classical groups. In particular those that correspond to finite             dimensional classical domains over complex vector spaces.                            As the mathematical vehicle for exploiting the symmetries                  inherent in a system, the representation theory of the classical                groups has had a profound impact upon mathematics itself,                       particularly in analysis and number theory, and upon theoretical                physics, especially quantum mechanics and elementary particle                   physics.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
